channel.title: Hmm
channel.description:
I'm currently hosting a source called (Situations pk) deltascape based and once in a while or ever 2 or so hours the server will get black screen'd and the players can't see or move anything. And in the run.bat there will always be null null null null
Does anyone know how to fix the black screen?

item.title: Hmm
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

[quote=“BlazezFire, post:3, topic:309632”]I have a auto restarter on for like every 40 minutes -.-
And it keeps doing that,it’s getting annoying.
I guess I’ll just use another source,only reason why I liked this one was because of the anti syi.[/quote]A lot of sources have SYIBlocker, just search for a good one, and make it yours. There are plenty of good sources being added everyday.

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

Blaze most servers have anti syi. Also coding up a quick ip blocker is pretty easy so you can use any source really. So try a new source hopefully it will have anti syi if not pm me i’ll make you one up real fast. Or maybe you could learn how to so you don’t have to rely on others =].

Read full topic

item.description:
@BlazezFire wrote:

I have a auto restarter on for like every 40 minutes -.-

I guess I’ll just use another source,only reason why I liked this one was because of the anti syi.

item.title: Hmm
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

Get a new source? and the server is ‘nulled’. It does soon go away, but something you could do is try an auto restarter for every 2 hours or how ever long till the nulling happens, a new source will be recommended.

Read full topic
